body:
Example: the text post in https://ruqqus.com/+Counting/post/2ajr/0k-counting-thread

The "new" link used to normally re-sort the submissions by **New** (actually, I would appreciate an option to set a default sort like the otherwise infamous R\*\*\*\*t has). Now, this is somehow removed and the only way to sort by New is to select it via the Sort By minimenu.
body_html:
Example: the text post in https://ruqqus.com/+Counting/post/2ajr/0k-counting-thread

The "new" link used to normally re-sort the submissions by New (actually, I would appreciate an option to set a default sort like the otherwise infamous R****t has). Now, this is somehow removed and the only way to sort by New is to select it via the Sort By minimenu.
title: It looks like sort=new is forcibly removed from Ruqqus links unless selected using the Sort By minimenu

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body_html:
@captainmeta4

These redirects are stripping off the query strings in the urls again. Same with capitalization redirects. https://ruqqus.com/+counting?sort=new

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
